## IPlotConfig interface

Defines the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPlotConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [annotations?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.annotations.md) | [IAnnotationStyles](./chart-def.iannotationstyles.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Named styles that can be applied to annotations. |
|  [chartType?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.charttype.md) | [ChartType](./chart-def.charttype.md) \| [ChartTypeString](./chart-def.charttypestring.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of chart to render. |
|  [dataLabels?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.datalabels.md) | [IDataLabels](./chart-def.idatalabels.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configure data labels for the whole chart. |
|  [height?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.height.md) | number \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Height of the plot. eg 100px, 100%, 100, etc |
|  [legend?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.legend.md) | [ILegendConfig](./chart-def.ilegendconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configure the chart's legend. |
|  [width?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.width.md) | number \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Width of the plot. eg 100px, 100%, 100, etc |
|  [x?](./chart-def.iplotconfig.x.md) | [IXAxisConfig](./chart-def.ixaxisconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configuration for the x axis. |
